text: Megan Dahle is an American politician serving as a member of the California State Assembly. A Republican, she represents the 1st State Assembly district, which encompasses parts of Northern California and the Sierra Nevada region. == Career == Prior to being elected to the State Assembly, she served on the Big Valley Joint Unified School Board. In 2019, after her husband, Brian Dahle resigned from the California State Assembly to serve in the California Senate, a special election was held to fill the seat. Dahle won the election, defeating Democratic farmer Elizabeth Betancourt. == Personal life == Dahle and her husband have three children. ==Elections == == References == == External links == * * Campaign website * Megan Dahle at ballotpedia.org Category:Living people Category:Members of the California State Assembly Category:California Republicans Category:Women state legislators in California Category:1975 births Category:21st-century American politicians Category:21st- century American women politicians
title: Megan Dahle
